json_to_edit.voice_over: In the vast emptiness of space, silence becomes your loudest companion.
json_to_edit.description: Captain Sarah Chen experiences intense loneliness aboard the International Space Station.
json_to_edit.lighting: Harsh, artificial light mixed with Earth's glow
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Hum of life support systems, occasional beeps
json_to_edit.name: Solitude in Orbit
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Captain Sarah Chen confronts her loneliness while on a long-term mission in space.

qa.action: The International Space Station floating in the darkness of space, Earth visible in the background.

hf.action: Captain Sarah Chen floating in the space station, looking out of a window at Earth.

tr.action: Sarah's eyes, reflecting the blue glow of Earth, a tear forming in zero gravity.

xc.action: Sarah interacting with the AI Assistant ARIA, seeking conversation and comfort.

ka.action: Mission control room on Earth, Dr. Holloway speaking to Sarah via video call.

fn.action: Dr. Holloway's face on the video screen, showing concern for Sarah's well-being.

af.action: Sarah performing routine maintenance tasks, trying to keep busy.

qo.action: Sarah watching a recorded video message from Lieutenant Foster, smiling despite her loneliness.

fp.action: Sarah's hand touching the cold window, Earth reflecting in her spacesuit visor.

edit_command: Add two shots at the end and remove the first shot. Don't change anything else.

updated_json.voice_over: In the vast emptiness of space, silence becomes your loudest companion.
updated_json.description: Captain Sarah Chen experiences intense loneliness aboard the International Space Station.
updated_json.lighting: Harsh, artificial light mixed with Earth's glow
updated_json.ambience_sound_keywords: Hum of life support systems, occasional beeps
updated_json.name: Solitude in Orbit
updated_json.scene_summary: Captain Sarah Chen confronts her loneliness while on a long-term mission in space.

hf.action: Captain Sarah Chen floating in the space station, looking out of a window at Earth.

tr.action: Sarah's eyes, reflecting the blue glow of Earth, a tear forming in zero gravity.

xc.action: Sarah interacting with the AI Assistant ARIA, seeking conversation and comfort.

ka.action: Mission control room on Earth, Dr. Holloway speaking to Sarah via video call.

fn.action: Dr. Holloway's face on the video screen, showing concern for Sarah's well-being.

af.action: Sarah performing routine maintenance tasks, trying to keep busy.

qo.action: Sarah watching a recorded video message from Lieutenant Foster, smiling despite her loneliness.

fp.action: Sarah's hand touching the cold window, Earth reflecting in her spacesuit visor.

yz.action: The space station passing through Earth's shadow, momentarily plunging Sarah into complete darkness.

wx.action: Sarah writing in a physical journal, her personal thoughts floating beside her in zero gravity.

label.rationale:
we will update the json according to the edit command by adding two new shots at the end and removing the first shot. this will involve modifying the "shots" section of the json, specifically updating the "list_display_order" and adding new shot entries. we'll also need to update the "number_of_shots" field to reflect the new total. here's how we'll proceed:

1. remove the first shot (qa) from the list_display_order and the shots dictionary.
2. add two new shots at the end with creative descriptions that fit the scene's context.
3. update the list_display_order to reflect these changes.
4. update the "number_of_shots" field from "9" to "10".

the rest of the json will remain unchanged as per the instruction.

value.action: The space station passing through Earth's shadow, momentarily plunging Sarah into complete darkness.
Sarah writing in a physical journal, her personal thoughts floating beside her in zero gravity.
